about:
Well hey guys and gals! I'm kimj0ngun. I am anEmerald donator rank on avicus, I love PC games such as Minecraft, LoL and TF2. I have an Xbox 360 and I play games like COD: Advanced Warfare and COD: Black Ops 2.. Let's just leave ghosts... Gosh that game was awful. Anyway, I have a YouTube channel that I am starting where I will upload montages and gameplays, here is the link https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCXsYYbovESFFrq-tUpqCy5A/feed
Oh, and here's my skin! http://mcss.me/kimj0ngun
interests: Minecraft, Call Of Duty, Java Coding, Squash, Rugby and anything sport related.
